front.title: RSVP for Triple-Play Video on Demand

abstract.t: This document summarizes SFR resource control requirements associatedwith the delivery of Triple Play Video on Demand services tobroadband residential users. It also describes the approach based onRSVP for addressing those requirements.Finally, this document recommends that the IETF continues maintenanceand extension of RSVP so that the industry can continue benefitingfrom quality interoperable resource control solutions based on RSVP.
